item.title: 库存下降后石油涨势扩大，中东成为关注焦点
item.description: 在美国原油库存减少之后，石油连续第二个交易日上涨，市场正在关注中东地区是否会爆发任何潜在的冲突。【原文：Oil rose for a second session after US crude inventories shrank, with the market monitoring the Middle East for any potential flare-up.】

item.title: 模型失效，量化对冲基金在中国失去优势
item.description: 中国量化对冲基金面临结束多年来跑赢大盘的风险，因为上个月受政府经济刺激计划刺激，当地股市大涨，打破了他们的模型，挤压了空头头寸。【原文：China’s quantitative hedge funds risk ending years of outperforming the market, after a surge in local stocks spurred by the government’s economic stimulus package last month beat their models and squeezed short positions.】

item.title: 全球投资者连续六个月购买印尼债券
item.description: 印尼新总统发出了遵守财政纪律的信号，而且鉴于美国大选引发的动荡，外国投资者对新兴市场的其他选择也很感兴趣，因此外国投资者纷纷涌入印尼主权债券市场。【原文：Foreign investors are piling into Indonesian sovereign bonds, drawn by the new president’s signals for fiscal discipline and their appetite for emerging market alternatives given US election-related volatility.】

item.title: 美国投票在即，最受关注的中国股票交易指南
item.description: 随着美国总统大选的临近，中国股市的投资者正在关注一些关键行业的前景，无论谁赢得大选，这些行业都将成为白宫的关注焦点。【原文：As the US presidential election nears, investors in Chinese stocks are zeroing in on the prospects of key sectors that look set to remain in the crosshairs of the White House, whoever wins it.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将因美债走势延续而下跌：市场综述
item.description: 由于强劲的经济数据模糊了美联储即将降息的前景，周四美国股市和政府债券下跌，亚洲股市为下跌做好了准备。【原文：Asian equities braced for declines Thursday after US stocks and government bonds fell as robust economic data blurred the picture for imminent Federal Reserve rate cuts.】

item.title: 前摩根大通顾问同意暂时停止客户挖角行为
item.description: 一名前摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：A former JPMorgan Chase & Co. private client adviser who jumped ship to Wells Fargo & Co. agreed to temporarily stop soliciting clients from his former book worth more than $250 million while an arbitration is underway.】

item.title: 最新版《使命召唤》玩家和 Xbox 游戏通行证创下新高
item.description: 微软公司首席执行官萨蒂亚-纳德拉（Satya Nadella）周三表示，《使命召唤：黑色行动 6》（Call of Duty: Black Ops 6）是这一长期畅销的大片游戏系列中最大的一款。首席执行官萨蒂亚-纳德拉（Satya Nadella）周三表示。【原文：Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 is the biggest release in the long-running blockbuster game series, Microsoft Corp. Chief Executive Officer Satya Nadella said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 购物者转向礼品消费，Etsy 因收入增长而股价大涨
item.description: Etsy Inc. 第三季度营收超出预期，佣金收入增加，其今年早些时候推出的送礼功能也获得了市场认可，股价在盘后交易中上涨超过 14%。【原文：Etsy Inc. shares rose more than 14% in extended trading after third-quarter revenue beat expectations as it made more on commissions and its gifting feature launched earlier this year gained ground.】

item.title: 印尼新总统面临 1,860 亿美元债务困境
item.description: 在执掌东南亚最大经济体数天后，印尼总统需要制定一项计划，以应对背负 1,860 亿美元债务的主要国有企业借贷成本上升的问题。【原文：Days after taking charge of Southeast Asia’s biggest economy, Indonesia’s president needs a plan to deal with rising borrowing costs for key state-owned enterprises carrying $186 billion of debt.】

item.title: 宏利财富与资产管理部门裁员 2.5%
item.description: 宏利金融公司（Manulife Financial Corp. ）已在其全球财富和资产管理业务部门裁员数百人，约占该部门员工总数的 2.5%。【原文：Manulife Financial Corp. has cut hundreds of jobs in its global wealth and asset management business, representing about 2.5% of the division’s staff.】

item.title: Alexa 的新人工智能大脑被困在实验室里
item.description:
亚马逊渴望与 ChatGPT 一较高下，但技术上的挑战迫使该公司一再推迟更新后的语音助手的首次亮相。【原文：

Amazon is eager to take on ChatGPT, but technical challenges have forced the company to repeatedly postpone the updated voice assistant’s debut.

】

item.title: 增长最快的主要经济体吹嘘的消费故事正在崩溃
item.description: 印度生产从肥皂到汽车等各种产品的消费公司正在敲响警钟：由于通货膨胀和失业问题影响了人们的情绪，城市中产阶级至少连续第二个季度继续缩减开支。【原文：Consumer companies in India making everything from soaps to cars are sounding the alarm: the urban middle class continues to trim its spending for at least the second straight quarter as inflation and unemployment weigh on sentiment.】

item.title: 人工智能价值 1.3 万亿美元的未来越来越取决于台湾
item.description: 当 Jung Yoonseok 为他的人工智能芯片初创公司寻找组装合作伙伴时，他几乎可以选择亚洲的任何一个国家，包括他的祖国韩国。但这位 Rebellions 公司的战略负责人却选择了台湾，因为在他看来，台湾在人才、成本和速度方面都是无与伦比的。【原文：When Jung Yoonseok was looking for an assembly partner for his AI chip startup, he had his pick of almost any country in Asia, including his native South Korea. Instead, the Rebellions strategy chief opted for Taiwan because of what he sees as an unparalleled combination of talent, cost and speed.】

item.title: 特朗普对拜登工业政策的威胁笼罩着亚洲企业
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）说，"关税 "是他最喜欢的词，他在竞选时曾打赌，高额的进口税将迫使制造商把工厂迁往美国。【原文：Donald Trump says “tariff” is his favorite word, campaigning on a bet that steep import levies will force manufacturers to move factories to the US.】

item.title: Roku 将停止报告用户数量；股价暴跌
item.description: 用于流媒体电视的机顶盒制造商 Roku 公司表示，从明年开始将不再报告使用其产品的家庭数量。【原文：Roku Inc., a manufacturer of set-top boxes used to stream TV, said it will no longer report the number of households that use its products, starting next year.】

item.title: 西门子同意以 100 亿美元收购软件集团 Altair
item.description: 西门子股份公司（Siemens AG）达成协议，以 100 亿美元（含债务）收购软件制造商 Altair Engineering Inc.【原文：Siemens AG reached an agreement to buy software maker Altair Engineering Inc. for $10 billion including debt in its largest-ever acquisition.】

item.title: Robinhood 因客户促销计划收入下滑
item.description: Robinhood Markets Inc. 下跌，原因是该经纪公司报告的营收不及分析师预期，因为一项客户促销计划要求该公司抵消部分收益。【原文：Robinhood Markets Inc. fell after the brokerage reported revenue that missed analyst estimates because of a customer promotion program that required the firm to offset a portion of the haul.】

item.title: 加密货币反弹期间，Coinbase 收入翻番，实现盈利
item.description: Coinbase Global Inc. 公布了第三季度利润，收入翻了一番，加密货币正从两年前的市场动荡中复苏。【原文：Coinbase Global Inc. posted a third-quarter profit and revenue doubled with cryptocurrencies in the midst of recovery from the market turmoil of two years ago.】

item.title: 亿万富翁大卫-马丁内斯收购墨西哥电视公司股份
item.description: 金融技术咨询公司（Fintech Advisory）背后的亿万富翁大卫-马丁内斯（David Martinez）购买了墨西哥媒体集团 Grupo Televisa SAB 7.8% 的股份，推动了该公司在美国上市的股票从历史低点反弹。【原文：David Martinez, the billionaire behind Fintech Advisory, has bought a 7.8% stake in the Mexican media conglomerate Grupo Televisa SAB, helping fuel a rebound in the US-traded shares from a record low.】

item.title: EBay 预计假日销售乏力，业绩下滑
item.description: EBay Inc.在预计假日季销售额低于分析师预期后在盘后交易中下跌，表明这家电子商务公司在与大型竞争对手的竞争中仍在挣扎。【原文：EBay Inc. dropped in extended trading after projecting holiday season sales that fell short of analysts’ estimates, suggesting the e-commerce company continues to struggle against larger rivals.】

item.title: 利率下降，澳银行估值面临盈利考验
item.description: 澳大利亚的贷款机构在公布盈利报告时，将比以往任何时候都更需要证明其股票估值的合理性，因为央行行长们正在夺走它们最大的 "尾翼"。【原文：Australian lenders will have to justify their equity valuations more than ever as they report earnings, now that central bankers are taking away their biggest tailwind.】

item.title: 微策略公司因比特币减值费用连续第三次亏损
item.description: 比特币对冲基金代理公司微策略公司（MicroStrategy Inc.【原文：Bitcoin hedge-fund proxy MicroStrategy Inc. posted a third consecutive quarterly loss after taking an impairment charge against the value of its roughly $18 billion stockpile of the cryptocurrency.】

item.title: 元销售额险胜人工智能提升广告收入
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司预计假日季度销售额将强于预期，并吹嘘其核心广告业务的人工智能改进。但这还不足以让华尔街满意。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. projected stronger-than-expected holiday quarter sales, and touted AI improvements to its core advertising business. But it wasn’t enough to satisfy Wall Street.】

item.title: 微软云推动收入增长超预期
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）的云计算和 Office 软件业务的季度收入增长强于预期，这表明该公司在人工智能领域的巨额投资已开始见效。【原文：Microsoft Corp.’s cloud-computing and Office software businesses fueled stronger-than-projected quarterly revenue growth, a sign that the company’s hefty investments in artificial intelligence are starting to pay off.】

item.title: DoorDash 自大流行开始以来首次实现营业利润
item.description: DoorDash 公司几乎在所有关键盈利指标上都超出了华尔街的预期，使这家外卖服务公司自大流行病开始以来首次实现营业利润。【原文：DoorDash Inc. beat Wall Street’s expectations on virtually every key earnings metric, allowing the delivery service to post its first operating profit since the start of the pandemic.】

item.title: 停战后，埃利奥特略微提升了对西南航空的兴趣
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）在与西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines Co.【原文：Elliott Investment Management is slightly increasing its economic exposure to 11.3% in Southwest Airlines Co. after agreeing to a truce with the carrier, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: DoorDash 增加 Lyft 折扣，以提高订阅量
item.description: DoorDash 公司正与 Lyft 公司合作，为其用户提供乘车折扣，共享乘车和外卖应用程序正依靠合作加深客户忠诚度。【原文：DoorDash Inc. is teaming up with Lyft Inc. to offer ride discounts to its subscribers, as rideshare and delivery apps lean on partnerships to deepen customer loyalty.】

item.title: 意大利梅洛尼称公务员在黑客案中不忠
item.description: 意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）就非法出售个人机密数据的全国性丑闻发表讲话，称一些公务员在从国家安全数据库中窃取政界和商界领袖数据的案件中表现不忠。【原文：Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni addressed a national scandal over the illegal sale of confidential personal data, saying some civil servants acted disloyally in a case that saw data on political and business leaders hacked from national security databases.】

item.title: 必和必拓收回继续竞购盎格鲁集团的言论
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group）被迫收回关于已经从英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）失败的竞购中 "走出来 "的言论，以避免被英国收购委员会束缚手脚。【原文：BHP Group has been forced to walk back from comments about having “moved on” from its failed Anglo American Plc bid to prevent its hands being tied by the UK takeover panel.】

item.title: 美国警告朝鲜军队可能扩大俄罗斯对乌克兰的战争
item.description: 美国国防部长劳埃德-奥斯汀（Lloyd Austin）说，朝鲜向俄罗斯派遣军队有可能扩大乌克兰冲突，因为盟国正试图阻止莫斯科和平壤在战场上部署士兵。【原文：US Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin said North Korea’s dispatch of troops to Russia risks widening the Ukraine conflict, as allies seek to discourage Moscow and Pyongyang from deploying the soldiers in battle.】
